profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-10-08 20:11:27 -0400.

repository.corpname: Digital Collections and Archives, Tufts University

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into five series: Subject files; Minutes; Photographs, artifacts, and videos; Student theses, dissertations, papers; and Unprocessed accessions.

custodhist.head: Custodial History
custodhist.p: Originally the collection contained material gathered by Russell Miller in preparation for writing his two volume history of Tufts, Light on the Hill. It includes subject files from or about the Dental School, Senior Dental Essays (Peridontia Papers) and Junior Dental Essays (Operative Dental Essays). This material was arranged by subject and no attempt has been made to recreate original order. Material relating to administering the collection was removed to the documentation files of the collection in the archives.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes artifacts, brochures, correspondence, meeting minutes, photographs, videos, student papers and theses, and subject files. Significant topics addressed in this collection include the history of the Tufts School of Dental Medicine, as well as the activities of its administrative officials, faculty members, and students.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Tufts University School of Dental Medicine was established in 1868 as Boston Dental College. It was incorporated into Tufts College in 1899. Although founded as a school to educate students from New England, today Tufts is renowned throughout the United States and the world as a center for academic and clinical excellence. Tufts boasts over 6,900 alumni composed of individuals from all fifty states and thirty-nine countries. The majority of the alumni outside of the USA have completed an Advanced Education Certificate program. Students receive a comprehensive education emphasizing the importance of didactic coursework, clinical experience, and practice management that prepares them to enter the work force as confident, proficient clinicians.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Some material in this collection may be protected by copyright and other rights. Please see "Reproductions and Use" on the Digital Collections and Archives website for more information about reproductions and permission to publish. Copyright to all materials created by Tufts University employees in the course of their work is held by the Trustees of Tufts University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research. This collection may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

did.unittitle: Boston Dental College 1898-1899, correspondence and [ownership transfer certificates]

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Certificate filed with Corporations Division describing the transfer of ownership of the Boston Dental College to Tufts College was not part of the original collection but is similar to the internal certificate from the Boston Dental College. Certificate document title is unknown.

scopecontent.p: This series contains three bound volumes of meeting minutes from the Board of Trustees of the Boston Dental College, the Faculty of the Tufts Dental School, and the Faculty of the Tufts Dental School Administrative Committee.

did.unittitle: Joseph E. Primack D'42 photographs and ephemera

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: One photo of Primack as student with microscope; two photos of Primack providing dental care to Reevan Levine on 1941-02-28, photos taken by Ralph Slate; three photos from reunion in 1992 and presentation of acknowledgment of 50 years of service; copy of Class of 1942 photograph; Petition for the suspension of classes on the Friday following Thanksgiving, 1938. Donated by Philip Primack.

did.unittitle: School of Dental Medicine 150th Anniversary Gala

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Video of the School of Dental Medicine's 150th Anniversary Gala on September 28, 2018 at the Museum of Science in Boston, MA. Program speakers included Richard Valachovic, President and CEO of ADEA; Dean Huw Thomas; President Anthony Monaco; and Swaitha Maripuri, D19.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Donated by University Advancement Special Events on behalf of TUSDM, 2018, accession UA-2019-043.

scopecontent.p: Tufts Dental Outlook; Tufts Dental Club of New York Bulletin; Dentufts; Dentech; Class Record; Omicron Kappa Upsilon meeting minutes; Syllabus of lecture on histology - 1910; TUSDM Continuing Education 2013-2014; issues of Journal of the Massachusetts Dental Society, 2013-2014, featuring TUSDM faculty.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This series contains some restricted material. Restrictions related to specific material are listed in the detailed contents list. This series may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series contains records from the School of Dental Medicine Development and Alumni Relations Office, including publications related to the Beyond Boundaries campaign, Vertical Expansion Initiative, and other School of Dental Medicine events.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This box contains some restricted material and may require review before it is available for use. Please contact DCA for further details.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Publications, printed and digital photographs on CD-R, and DVDs related to the Beyond Boundaries campaign, Vertical Expansion Initiative, and other School of Dental Medicine events.
